name: Harlot
ability: Each night*, choose a living player: if they agree, you learn their character, but you both might die.

legacy.otherNightReminder: The Harlot points to a living player. Wake that player and show the 'This character selected you' card and the Harlot token. That player either nods or shakes their head. If they nod: show the Harlot that player's character token. Both players might die.

otherNights.description: Each night, choose a living player: if they agree, you learn their character, but you both might die.

information.customMessage: Choose a player; if they agree, learn their character.
